title:
Biggest stock movers today: Nvidia, Air Products, Estee Lauder, 4D 
Molecular and more
text: Maria Korneeva/Moment via Getty Images Stock futures were lower on Monday following the latest commentary from U.S. Federal Reserve Chair Jerome Powell, which dampened investor expectations for near-term interest rate cuts just ahead of significant corporate earnings reports. Here are some of Monday's biggest stock movers:
